Callie, Saraban:
A great warrior from people People. They say he came out of Elmore. He fights with two swords... And also searching for the Holy Grail. Cayn had declined the award and, without lingering in the village, went further.
I don't know who he is and why he came to us for help. But I think that Caine is the thread that can lead us to the Holy Grail.
We have to find him.
